scripts.postbuild:
set -e; mkdir -p dist; \
[ -f _redirects ] && cp -f _redirects dist/_redirects || true; \
[ -f _headers ] && cp -f _headers dist/_headers || true; \
[ -f ads.txt ] && cp -f ads.txt dist/ads.txt || true; \
[ -f robots.txt ] && cp -f robots.txt dist/robots.txt || true; \
if [ -d deals ]; then \
  rm -rf dist/deals; mkdir -p dist/deals; \
  cp -R deals/. dist/deals/; \
  [ -f deals/index.html ] && cp -f deals/index.html dist/deals.html || true; \
  echo '>> deals copied:'; ls -la dist/deals || true; \
fi
